title: CHAMPIONSIP KALISTA!!! NEW LEAK FROM THE PBE

embed.description: Championship Kalista Skin for 975RP,and also Championship kalista lol is a limited skin,so you won't be able to get it from shop when time ends! Champion ship Kalista Skin Spotlight was done with another player named ARoamingHetero (big thanks to him). Hope you guys enjoyed this Kalista Skin and are excited to see future Kalista Skins.

body: any thoughts on this? and does anyone know if this will be avalible for purchase normally?  or will i have to be in gold?{{champion:429}}

replies.body: you realise the channels name is LOL Leaks?

> [{quoted}](name=Angel Of Hell,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=B4Z67Nv8,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-09-02T01:09:49.537+0000)
>
> you realise the channels name is LOL Leaks?

The Kalista skin is in PBE for everyone to see. Not a leak.

good point

i just realised the PBE is PUBLIC BETA ENVIROMENT

sorry XD

> and does anyone know if this will be avalible for purchase normally? or will i have to be in gold?

This is a **Championship** skin not a **Victorious** skin, so it will be available for purchase in the store, though only for a limited time. Not to mention, it says in the description of the video that it will be available in the store...
